MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L20 postcode area of Bootle, affecting properties in Fernhill Road, Menai Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  2.21pm.Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5pm on Jan 20, 2021.
